data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Mario Humberto Vargas Mata signals a free kick to America in their own half.
In the minute 1, Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Pachuca in the half of America.
Pachuca to take a throw-in in America territory.
In the minute 5, Pachuca have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
Free kick for America in their own half.
In the minute 8, Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo has been interrupted briefly for a check on Emanuel Aguilera, who is down injured.
In the minute 10, America awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Emanuel Aguilera (America) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Sebastian Caceres.
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 12, Free kick in a good position for America!
Pachuca's Jorge Hernandez has been booked in Pachuca de Soto.
Jorge Hernandez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Pachuca.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Mario Humberto Vargas Mata.
In the minute 15, Mario Humberto Vargas Mata signals a America throw-in in Pachuca's half.
Mario Humberto Vargas Mata signals a throw-in for Pachuca, close to America's area.
Mario Humberto Vargas Mata awards America a goal kick.
In the minute 17, Mario Humberto Vargas Mata signals a free kick to America in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
Corner awarded to America.
In the minute 20, Goal kick for America at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Mario Humberto Vargas Mata.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pachuca de Soto.
In the minute 23, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Pachuca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in America's half?
Ball safe as Pachuca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 26, Pachuca are in shooting range from this free kick.
At Estadio Miguel Hidalgo, Santiago Caseres has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Erick Aguirre for Pachuca gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 28, Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
Mario Humberto Vargas Mata signals a free kick to America in their own half.
Emmanuel Garcia (Pachuca) has received a yellow card from Mario Humberto Vargas Mata.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
Goal kick for America at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Free kick for Pachuca in the half of America.
In the minute 31, Mario Humberto Vargas Mata signals a Pachuca throw-in in America's half.
Can America capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Mario Humberto Vargas Mata awards Pachuca a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Mario Humberto Vargas Mata signals a free kick to Pachuca.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Mario Humberto Vargas Mata.
America have a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Free kick America.
In Pachuca de Soto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to America.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for America in the half of Pachuca.
Mario Humberto Vargas Mata awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 44, America have been awarded a corner by Mario Humberto Vargas Mata.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pachuca de Soto.
In the minute 45, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for America close to the penalty box.
America's Sebastian Cordova is on target but unsuccessful.
The first-half is over at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Throw-in for Pachuca in their own half.
Paulo Pezzolano is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo with Rodrigo Salinas replacing Emmanuel Garcia.
In the minute 47, America to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
Bruno Valdez of America smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Can Pachuca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in America's half?
In the minute 48, Pachuca to take a throw-in in America territory.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can America get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
In the minute 50, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Andres Ibarguen.
Miguel Herrera (America) is making a second change, with Alonso Escoboza replacing the possibly injured Andres Ibarguen.
Free kick Pachuca.
In the minute 54, It's a goal kick for the away team in Pachuca de Soto.
Jorge Hernandez has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
Goal kick for America at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
In the minute 59, Paulo Pezzolano (Pachuca) is making a second substitution, with Kazim replacing Roberto de la Rosa.
Erick Sanchez is replacing Victor Sosa for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Free kick for America in their own half.
In the minute 62, Gustavo Cabral for Pachuca drives towards goal at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Federico Vinas.
Santiago Caseres in America has been yellow-carded a second time by Mario Humberto Vargas Mata and is being sent off.
In the minute 67, Mario Humberto Vargas Mata signals a free kick to America in their own half.
Pachuca have a goal kick.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
Free kick for Pachuca in the half of America.
Mario Humberto Vargas Mata signals a free kick to America in their own half.
In the minute 74, Pachuca are pushing forward but Felipe Pardo's finish is wide of the goal.
Mario Humberto Vargas Mata awards America a goal kick.
Throw-in for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
The away team have replaced Roger Martinez with Ruben Gonzalez. This is the fourth substitution made today by Miguel Herrera.
In the minute 75, America make their third substitution with Henry Martin replacing Federico Vinas.
Throw-in for Pachuca close to the penalty box.
In the minute 77, Corner awarded to America.
Throw-in America.
In the minute 79, Pachuca have a goal kick.
Roberto Nurse is replacing Luis Chavez for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Throw-in for America in their own half.
Mario Humberto Vargas Mata signals a free kick to Pachuca.
In the minute 81, Free kick for America in their own half.
Throw-in for America in the half of Pachuca.
Mario Humberto Vargas Mata awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 83, It's a goal kick for the away team in Pachuca de Soto.
Pachuca have a dangerous throw-in.
In Pachuca de Soto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 85, Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, Mario Humberto Vargas Mata awards America a goal kick.
Free kick America.
Erick Aguirre is booked for the home team.
Penalty! Mario Humberto Vargas Mata points to the spot, great chance for America...
Free kick for Pachuca in the half of America.
Mario Humberto Vargas Mata will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
America awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mario Humberto Vargas Mata signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
Pachuca have been awarded a penalty in Pachuca de Soto...
Free kick for America in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-2.
It's now 0-2 to America as Sebastian Cordova scores from the spot.
Goal! Pachuca now trail just 1-2 thanks to a Kazim spot-kick.
